description:
This dataset offers a granular look at the daily Open, High, Low, Close, and Volume (OHLCV) data for some of the Apple Inc. stock (AAPL) Updated every trading day, it aims to serve as a resource for researchers, traders, and finance enthusiasts.

Key Features:
- OHLCV: The foundational data points for any financial analysis.
- Adjusted Close: This considers dividends and splits, offering a true reflection of value over time.
- Change %: Offers a day-to-day percentage change, capturing market momentum.
- 20 Day Average Volume: A rolling metric to gauge trading liquidity and interest over roughly a month.


**Split Adjusted:** Given its history of stock splits, a separate dataset with split-adjusted data is available, ensuring accuracy in historical comparisons.

---

Image source: https://www.tradingview.com/symbols/NASDAQ-AAPL/history-timeline/
title: Apple (AAPL) Stock Data
